Package jot.math.geometry

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Node
    Interface to specify the default methods to implement for each geometry node.
    Renderable
    Interface to specify the default methods to implement for each renderable geometry.
    Transformable
    Interface that a class transformGroup must implement, i.e., an object that contains one or more sub-meshes each with one associated BV.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Mesh
    Abstract class that a mesh (3D geometry representation) class must extend.
    MorphingMesh
    Class that represents a 3D geometry that can morph over time.
    PolygonMesh
    Class that represents a 3D geometry, i.e., it contains vertices, normals, and textureCoords values, and the ordered indexes information required to render them.
    SkinnedMesh
    Class that represents a 3D geometry that can be animated using a skeleton.
    Transformations
    Class that implements geometric transformations given a vector, i.e.,shear, rotate, scale, and translate.
    TransformGroup
    Class that implements a transformGroup, i.e., an object that contains one or more sub-meshes each with one associated BV.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Mesh.PrimitiveType
